Class StringUtil

java.lang.Object
com.github.bhlangonijr.chesslib.util.StringUtil
public class StringUtil extends Object
A utility collection of operations on strings.
Author:
bhlangonijr

  • Method Details

    • lastSequence

      public static String lastSequence(String str, int size)
      Extracts the last char sequence from a string, that is, the last size chars.
      Parameters:
      str - the string
      size - the number of chars to extract
      Returns:
      the extracted substring

    • afterSequence

      public static String afterSequence(String str, String seq, int size)
      Extracts from a string the char sequence of length size that occurs after the given subsequence.
      Parameters:
      str - the string
      seq - the subsequence to search
      size - the number of chars to extract
      Returns:
      the extracted substring, or an empty string if the subsequence is not found

    • afterSequence

      public static String afterSequence(String str, String seq)
      Extracts from a string the char sequence that occurs after the given subsequence.
      Parameters:
      str - the string
      seq - the subsequence to search
      Returns:
      the extracted substring, or an empty string if the subsequence is not found

    • beforeSequence

      public static String beforeSequence(String str, String seq)
      Extracts from a string the char sequence that occurs before the given subsequence.
      Parameters:
      str - the string
      seq - the subsequence to search
      Returns:
      the extracted substring, or the original string if the subsequence is not found

    • normalize

      public static String normalize(String str)
      Removes extra whitespaces in the string. It replaces each sequence of two or more whitespaces with a single one.
      Parameters:
      str - the string from which to remove extra whitespaces
      Returns:
      the string without extra whitespaces

    • replaceAll

      public static StringBuilder replaceAll(StringBuilder builder, String from, String to)
      Replaces inside a string builder every occurrence of a subsequence of chars with another one. It returns the modified builder.
      Parameters:
      builder - the builder in which to replace the subsequence of chars
      from - the subsequence to replace with another one
      to - the subsequence with which to replace the original one
      Returns:
      the modified string builder

    • translate

      public static void translate(StringBuilder str, char[] table)
      Replaces the chars in a builder with the ones stored in the translation table. The indexes in the table refers to the code points of the chars to be replaced.
      Parameters:
      str - the string builder in which to replace the chars
      table - the translation table

    • translate

      public static void translate(StringBuilder str, Map<Character,Character> map)
      Replaces the chars in a builder with the ones stored in the translation map.
      Parameters:
      str - the string builder in which to replace the chars
      map - the translation map

    • countOccurrences

      public static int countOccurrences(String str, char charToCount)
      Counts the occurrences of a char inside a string.
      Parameters:
      str - the string in which to count the occurrences of the char
      charToCount - the char to count
      Returns:
      the number of times the char is found inside the string
